column4: Does the ubuntu-11.10-desktop-i386 iso file support booting from a USB flash drive? Also is there a reliable tool to create the USB image, I have been trying unetbootin-linux-563 and it isn't working with this file.
Unfortunately I'm in Suse right now trying to recover the ubuntu install
you might just want to try rescuelinux. there is no special need to have the ubuntu install system to perform a rescue
